comment: Okay , now this one's gonna be interesting ! If you had million rupees and had to use it all on Myntra , what would you shop for ? Tell us using lucky winners that make us go WHOA get Myntra vouchers worth Rs . . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Okay , now this one's gonna be interesting ! If you had million rupees and had to use it all on Myntra , what would you shop for ? Tell us using lucky winners that make us go WHOA get Myntra vouchers worth Rs . . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / interest-01
            :ARG0 (o / one
                  :mod (t / this))
            :time (n / now)
            :ARG1-of (o2 / okay-01))
      :snt2 (s / shop-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / amr-unknown)
            :condition (a2 / and
                  :op1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                              :quant 1000000
                              :unit (r / rupee)))
                  :op2 (o3 / obligate-01
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG2 (u / use-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 m2
                              :location (c / company
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Myntra"))
                              :mod (a3 / all)))))
      :snt3 (t2 / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (w2 / win-01)
                        :mod (l / lucky)
                        :ARG0-of (m3 / make-02
                              :ARG1 (g / go-05
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG1 (g2 / get-01
                                          :ARG0 w
                                          :ARG1 (v / voucher
                                                :ARG1-of (w3 / worth-01
                                                      :ARG2 m2
                                                      :quant (r2 / Rs.))))))))
            :ARG2 w))

      :snt5 (f / forget-01
